subj-group.subject: SECCION VIII. LA FILOSOFIA DEL LENGUAJE Y SU HISTORIA

title-group.article-title: LA TEORIA DE LA ACCION COMO FUNDAMENTO DE UNA EXPLICACION PRAGMATICA DE LOS ACTOS DEL HABLA

abstract.p: In this paper, I assume that speech act theory should be based on a theory of action. I will try to show that a pragmatic theory of speech acts (Gazdar, 1981) can be easily based on a certain theory of action (a model combining Searle's and Von Wright's proposals).
